channel.title: Slow Webclient
channel.description:
Does anyone know why my webclient is loading really really slow?
I restarted it for like 3 times. And it still loads slowly.
First Java loads slow after that there comes a white screen , and then after like 5 min there finally comes a table where u can click "run".
that loads the cache..
(It isn't online for others yet, is this the problem?)
the site is hosting on 000webhost

item.title: Slow Webclient
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:4, topic:408032”]I want every hybrid pvp source to go into a trash bin.
and all topic’s removed.[/quote]I sort of agree. I just don’t like this overkill of 317s Seems like more difficulty in maintaining a successful and universal client/web client.

If you don’t know much about the client you’re using, I’d start a little more easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Slow Webclient
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:

item.title: Slow Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If you are loading 602+ the cache will be massive. Follow a tutorial on cache packing. DO note that there is a small little bug you will have to work out on your own for hybrid clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Slow Webclient
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

maybe your cache is too big so it takes some time to download and unzip it
reupload your cache to dropbox, but when you zip it click Compress Options and put Compress Method to Very Fast

Read full topic
